page.title: 04LIFE STYLES cont
page.content: Dad got some pop and chewing gum.Then we looked for the man who signed the paper.But we could not find him.For dinner I had ham sandwiches,yoghurt and some chewing gum.We had to wait for half an hour.Then we set off for Tillicoultry with some steel.When we got there the man was waiting for us.We tipped the steel.Then we went to Dundee across the Tay bridge.We went to this place where they make bed sheets.We loaded them up.Then we went to Ridgeways and I sat on top of the load while they loaded some more on to it.Dad,Keith and John sheeted the wagon up and we went to the truck stop for Supper I had chips and sausage followed by trifle.Dad and I had two games of Pool.Then I had a drink of coke and went to bed in the cab.
